sec.div: Prey item composition and longitudinal record
sec.p:
A recent analysis (
15 ) provided invertebrate TL. We calculated seabird TL as a function of stomach contents using
TL
= (
∑
i = 1
n
P j
×
TL j
) + 1
where P
j is the proportion of the jth food item based on the literature dietary data and TL
j is the MTL of the jth prey item family (
15 ,
50 ). We plotted TL estimates at 1980 over the fitted TP series ( Fig. 1). Hierarchal Bayesian mixing models (Supplementary Methods) generated prey proportions over time, using prey TL to reconstruct the TP series.
